title: spelunx - CAVERN Toolkit
description: Developed beginner-friendly toolkit including Unity SDK, documentation and tutorials, and sample experiences to empower creators to focus on designing for this proprietary novel immersive platform. Worked as gameplay programmer for the sample scenes, user researcher for developer experience, documentation lead for tutorials and development process on project website, and audio designer for surround audio research.
role: Gameplay Programmer, User Researcher, Documentation Lead, Audio Designer

details.focus: Developer experience research, playtesting, surround sound design, sample scene development

title: TACIT - R&D for VR Haptics in Emotional Storytelling
description: Produced research project investigating haptic feedback for emotional resonance in VR. Led playtesting strategy and facilitated cross-disciplinary collaboration. Developed prototyping artifacts for rapid user testing. Documented findings and development process on project website.

details.focus: Innovative haptic R&D, playtesting, prototype development,cross-disciplinary collaboration
details.tools: Unity 6, Meta SDK, bHaptics TactGlove, Trello

title: Two to Foxtrot
description: Created 2-player co-op platformer where players see different aspects of the world. Served as main programmer implementing player systems and puzzle mechanics.

title: EiAi - UX Research for using LLMs to aid UX Designers to understand hard-to-reach users
description: Explored how large language models can help UX researchers understand hard-to-reach user populations through synthetic data generation and analysis.
